text:
Hi community :wave:

May I gauge your opinion about text-to-speech AI use in converting HubSpot blog posts to audio files?

We have created a <https://absolut.kohorta.co/blog/email-marketing-the-anatomy-of-an-effective-marketing-email|demo page> with an audio player where you can listen to a blog post instead of reading it.

Do you think it is mature enough for use in the real world?
Hi Roman, do you also plan on implementing the other way around? Like having it convert Podcasts into Blogposts/ Transcripts/ShowNotes?
i really, like it, it sounds quite natural to me
Sure. We can try the other way around. Do you think there is a demand for that?
A lot of videos or Podcasts do have transcripts below them

can I create app like
my website contact move to HubSpot app ?
is it possible ?
if yes then tell me how ?
actually m search from last 15 days but no resources
HubSpot docs too difficult and not compatible current system working. docs is old system.
no video tutorial noting else.
i also installed many app from hubpost each app have error in different stages.
